name: Fluffy The Cloud
description:
░░░░░░░░░░
░░ GAME IDEA
░░░░░░░░
░░░ YOU ARE A FLUFFY WHITE CLOUD
░░░░░░
░░░░ FILLED WITH A MURDEROUS RAGE
░░░
░░░░░ YOU CANNOT EXPRESS
░

Use your rain to charge your ligthning, the humans (red things) will run away.

Humans will come to you if you use your snow. It will also unload your lightning charges.

Hit humans with your lightnings to score.

The game end when the wind push you out of the city.

Use the left click to make rain.
Use the right click to make snow.
Use space to make lightning.

Use "E"/"R"/"T" to change the point of view. (First person, Third Person, Random Human view).

Nicolas Leray
GameIdea gamejam 2016
